channel.title: procedural on Jez
channel.description: Recent content in procedural on Jez

item.title: Voxel World
item.description: Experimenting with a Voxel engine Unity asset to see if it would satisfy an idea I had for a deformable-terrain turret game.

item.title: Road to Sheep Island
item.description: Building on my procedurally-generated island mesh, the next step was to see about bringing some life to the land.

item.title: Island Mesh
item.description: Building on Voronoi and Delaunay grids, I then sought to work out how to turn that into geometry in Unity.

item.title: Early World Gen Tweets
item.description: Early experiments learning Voronoi and Delaunay algorithms with the excellent resources provided on https://www.redblobgames.com/.
